projects.Name: JEMS Map Creation and Editing Software
projects.Short Description: Created a full-stack ReactJS map editing application software complete with sessions, user interactions and a fully-integrated node-managed MongoDB datastore with a group of 4 using test driven development.

projects.Name: 3D NURBS Interpolator and Approximator.
projects.Short Description: Developed a full-stack web application using Node and p5js for simulating Non-Uniform Rational B-Splines that approximate 3D position and orientation quaternion data points used for predicting travel paths of rigid bodies.

projects.Name: Control System for Magnetic Actuators and Soft Robotics
projects.Short Description: Designed and built a 3-DOF magnet manipulator with UI, multi-threaded software, and optimized closed-loop multi-motor controller using C, Python, and MicroPython, applying control theory concepts to ensure accurate and stable positioning of the magnet.

projects.Name: Crypto Exchange Watcher
projects.Short Description: Developed C program for logging and aggregating live data from an unlimited number of concurrently loading crypto exchange channels with dynamic thread allocation and async I/O.

projects.Name: DistilBERT Fine Tuning
projects.Short Description: Used PyTorch and Huggingface Transformers libraries to fine tune Distilbert LLM on movie reviews with up to 92% precision and explore the effect of layer freezing.

projects.Name: EmbeddedML
projects.Short Description: Lead a team of 4, implemented various numerical integration algorithms and filters, optimized web-enabled logging and trained classification model with up to 99% accuracy for handheld, gesture-recognition micro-controllers.
Bullets: Designed and developed a handheld gesture recognition device that leverages machine learning models to classify both acceleration and displacement data into shapes.
Gathered 1000+ gesture training samples, and trained gesture-recognition machine learning models to differentiate between 5 gestures with up to 99% accuracy.
Implemented data pipeline from IMU to Web Server for wireless data acquisition, model training, and model deployment.
Used a wide array of filtering and integration algorithms to transform IMU acceleration data into displacement data.

projects.Name: Airborne Object Interception Device
projects.Short Description: Utilized CV-enabled camera devices to write a C application hosted on a micro controller to detect an aerial object, fit its travel path to an nth degree polynomial and predict the path of a second intercepting object before hitting the ground.

projects.Name: Classfinder
projects.Short Description: Script that web scraped Stony Brook University academic program bulletins that constructed course dependency graphs in order to optimize graduation time and class scheduling.

projects.Name: MFC-CB Event and Attendance Software
Bullets: Created attendance and event system complete with secure database and intuitive client-facing user interface.
Centralized Database for national level data acquisition, significantly increased reliability, and cut load times by 50% by relying on client-initiated queries.
System serves 200+ members in 12 Campus Based organizations in Texas, California, Minnesota, and New York.

projects.Name: Kalihin - Task Managing Web App
Bullets: Currently developing full stack task management and scheduling web application that organizes tasks by a priority algorithm.
Designed PostgreSQL database hosted by AWS, accessible through RESTful API, and optimized for training a model later on.
Rewrote previous Flask backend using Django.

projects.Name: Amazon - Data store replacement and Deprecation
Bullets: Improved database reliability and ease-of-access by combining schema and cutting the number database tables 3.
Designed and implemented data pipeline that processes 10+ TB of data daily.
Performed meticulous testing to ensure complete compatibility old tables and their replacements.

Descriptions: Enhanced productivity by automating developer workflow using AWS CloudFormation, Lambda and ApiGateway, reducing operation time by 50% and minimizing errors through automated testing and custom NPM build processes.
Leveraged AWS Cloudwatch, DynamoDB, and Eventbridge to detect data discrepancies in 1000+ tables within 5 minutes of load time.
Provided ample alternatives to team by designing fully realized service stack mock ups before design discussions.
Utilized .NET ILogger interface to standardize and aggregate logs from Azure App Services, VMs and SQL servers, into single Log Analytics service, catching errors and reducing debugging time by 20%.
Designed and implemented user verification and document sharing system from database schema to customer-facing UI.
Designed localization architecture in order to translate web application into various languages and dialects.
Deprecated and designed replacements for high-traffic tables, reducing space usage by 30% and downstream processing time by 50% without data loss.
Loaded and transformed information from data lakes containing 1000+ TB of data using AWS Redshift, S3 and Apache Hive, allowing for processing in AWS Glue and Athena.
Designed Apache Spark testing suite to assess downstream impact of proposed ETL and DDL changesâ€“ensuring data integrity for 100+ customers in security.

College: College of Engineering and Applied Sciences
